constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 17 (Thursday, January 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LATTA:
H.R. 555.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Supreme Court's Commerce Clause precedents and under
the Constitution's grants of powers to Congress under the
Equal Protection, Due Process, and Enforcement Clauses of the
Fourteenth Amendment.
[Page H251]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: Protecting the Dignity of Unborn Children Act of 2021
